alert.note: Alert for Chester (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:08AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Chester County through 645 AM EDT... At 608 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chester, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chester, Fort Lawn, Richburg, Lowrys, Chester State Park, Fishing Creek Reservoir, Great Falls and Edgemoor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
